title: About
text:
Hi I’m Mark - a scientist turned software developer, living in Edinburgh, Scotland
This blog will feature:

Insights from data
Building online software in public
Experiences with tools and workflows
Escapades in husbandary (being a husband not cultivating plants/animals), fatherhood, sport/fitness and food.

title: Blog 2.0
text:
I used to blog for years but it slowly tailed off.
I miss having a place on the internet where I can put down ideas, progress on side projects and general life stuff. So here it is - blog 2.0.
Mainly what you’ll get here is:

Insights from data
Building online software in public
Experiences with tools and workflows
Escapades in husbandary (being a husband not cultivating plants/animals), fatherhood, sport/fitness and food.

I’ve always been fond of authors that try to make their work reproducible and I will attempt that too for the data/software stuff, time permitting.
That’s enough for a welcome, now onto the first post.



by Shubham Dhage
